text:
そう言えば、夏油の証言によれば五条のフェロモンは春の匂いらしい。 五条も同じく、夏油を冬の匂いと季節で表現していた。
最近の研究でフェロモンというのは香水のように３つの段階に分かれていることが判明した。
最も強く香り大抵の異性が嗅ぎ取れるトップノート、次いで香りそれなりに相性が良い異性しか感じ取れないミドルノート、そして滅多に相手が居らず遺伝子レベルの相性じゃないと存在すら掴めないラストノート。
trans:
On that subject, according to Geto's testimony, Gojo's pheromone seems to have a spring scent. In the same way as Gojo, Geto expresses a season through the scent of winter.
Recent research has proved that pheromones are divided into 3 stages, similar to perfumes.
The strongest scents are the top notes generally sensed by the opposite sex; the next scent is the middle notes, which are only sensed by the opposite sex when they have good chemistry to some extent; and finally, the existence of the base notes cannot even be understood, except through a genetic level of chemistry with partners, something which seldom exists.
